A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visuals are top notch. Nothing really happens. It's like the movie Speed in space. No character development. A lot of sub-plots that didn't  fit in. The visuals and sound are  Really Really GOOD... I guess you could watch it on some kind a trip to get full appreciation. Glad my Ticket was free. Disappointed with the whole story. I think I'll skip EP9
